Description: An identifier should be drawn from an existing identification scheme or established list of codes. This field is used to indicate the scheme or codelist in which the identifier will be found. For Organization Identifiers, this value should represent an Organization Identifier Scheme, and for item classifications, this value should represent an Item Classification Scheme .
The value that identifies or classifies the parent entity, drawn from the identification scheme in use.

The text-based description of the id, if provided by the scheme. In the case of a goods classification, this maybe the description of the code. In the case of an organzational identifier, this may be the legal name as recorded in the identification scheme used.
A URI to identify the Thing under the given scheme. In the event individual URIs are not available for items in the identifier scheme this value should be left blank.
